QuestData.Title: A Village in Peril
QuestData.Description: The corpse of Darcy Heathrow lies before you pierced by several arrows and knife wounds.$b$bIn one hand she clutches a note, written with a feeble hand, that reads:$b$b"The dead march on Bradensbrook.$b$bHelp us, please!"
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Mayor Heathrow at Bradensbrook.
QuestData.RewardText: We don't need any help, and we don't like strangers wanderin' around on our land.
